item.title: Archery Bastions: Castle War
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Archery Bastions: Castle War is a team arrow launch puzzle strategy game. Your target is to eliminate all enemy archers before they eliminate yours. Be aware of the enemy melee troops, they will crash your tower if you can’t shoot them down before they get close to your castle.On PC and MobileTap and hold = […]
item.content:encoded:
Archery Bastions: Castle War is a team arrow launch puzzle strategy game. Your target is to eliminate all enemy archers before they eliminate yours. Be aware of the enemy melee troops, they will crash your tower if you can’t shoot them down before they get close to your castle.
On PC and MobileTap and hold = aimRelease the finger = fire

item.title: Crowd Defense
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Crowd Defense is a tower defense puzzle game. With a heavy machine gun and a cannon, you need to eliminate all incoming enemy units before they get close to your castle. Your weapon has limited ammo and reloading speed.On PC and MobileHold and drag = aim with auto fire
item.content:encoded:
Crowd Defense is a tower defense puzzle game. With a heavy machine gun and a cannon, you need to eliminate all incoming enemy units before they get close to your castle. Your weapon has limited ammo and reloading speed.
On PC and MobileHold and drag = aim with auto fire
